SURE.JK.summary: PT Super Energy Tbk, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes oil and gas in Indonesia. The company processes natural gas into condensate, liquefied petroleum gas, lean gas, and compressed natural gas (CNG). It also trades in and distributes fuel and CNG; and offers transportation services for mining and other petroleum products, as well as operates CNG station. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
